title: Does using Eye drops, Ear drops, or Nose drops break our fast? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: Shila says can we put eyedrops yes ear drops yes and nose drops while fasting nose drops is an issue of dispute if you ensure that it does not go down your throat in this case it's hella but if you put nose drops and you feel that it's going down to your throat this breaks your fasting
